PICOs.Population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS G12C mutation who have progressed after at least one prior systemic therapy, including platinum-based chemotherapy or anti-PD-1/PD-L1 immunotherapy.
PICOs.Intervention: Sotorasib, recommended for use within the Cancer Drugs Fund.
PICOs.Outcomes: Increased time before cancer progression and improved overall survival compared to current treatments.
